About Me

I am a 31 year old, self-teaching the skills necessary to search for employment in tech. Living in the south-metro of Minnesota.

Work

Boozy Books

Built with: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, Node

An app which allows users to search the title of a book and generate a drink-pairing with their search. Users can track their searches in a "To be read" section.

View Project on GitHub

Fictional Guacamole

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, Node

An application for a pet-boarding facility, which allows users to crate an account to add their pets to, giving the facility easy access to their customers boarded pets.

View Project on GitHub

What's Soap

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, Node

A site for saving soap recipes. It allows users to create an account to save and edit their recipes.
